title: Annie rework please.
body: Not fun to play or verse. Cancer mechanics.

replies.body: Annie is boring to play now as she isn't special, Her range was what made her difficult to vs and fun to play. Now she is boring
I wouldnt have a clue what range it was dude, all i know is that it was decreased to a smaller range. I'm fairly certain that included her Q range too
na it was only her auto range, which really only hinders AD annie, which nobody plays, hence useless nerf

Nah it was support Annie because they used to take AD runes on her in pro play and auto harass whilst banditting and proccing spell thiefs and even in the LCS just using bandit and spell thiefs she was rather annoying in lane level 1, the damage added up quickly and she outranged basically everyone and Riot considered it not to suit her theme, which to me really means that pros were sorta abusing this weird quirk of annie and like all good things, they ruined it for all of us.

(It was 625 and they reduced it to 575).
I have fun vsing Annie because I know its free elo for me.
